data.name: Mechajammer Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The perfect accompaniment to the grimy cyberpunk world of Calitana, Mechajammer’s OST combines dirty synth lines with strong 80s vibes to create the perfect soundtrack to the game - over two hours of Mechajammer’s very distinct flavour of synthwave.

Mechajammer Original Soundtrack - arranged and composed by Kevin Balke.

Total Playtime - 02:03:58
